attributes.action: Mark English A Levels with same generosity as Welsh A Levels
attributes.additional_details: If this isn't done, then students in England with similar exam performances will obtain worse grades than students a few miles over the border, and some will miss university places as a result.
attributes.background: This year, the Welsh A Levels are still marked more generously than English A Levels. It would be fair to English students to change this, so that English students are not at a disadvantage when securing university places.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636929
